docs.lead_paragraph: A multi-million dollar deal to resettle refugees from an Australia-run detention camp on the Pacific nation of Nauru to Cambodia has been irreparably damaged by a Rohingya refugee's decision to go home to Myanmar, the opposition and refugee advocates said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Critics: Australia Deal to Send Refugees to Cambodia Damaged
headline.print_headline: Critics: Australia Deal to Send Refugees to Cambodia Damaged

docs.snippet: A multi-million dollar deal to resettle refugees from an Australia-run detention camp on the Pacific nation of Nauru to Cambodia has been irreparably damaged by a Rohingya refugee's decision to go home to Myanmar, the opposition and refugee advocates...

headline.main: Lung Screening May Not Push Smokers to Quit

docs.abstract: Money spent on screening smokers for lung cancer may be better spent helping them kick the habit altogether.
docs.snippet: Money spent on screening smokers for lung cancer may be better spent helping them kick the habit altogether.

docs.lead_paragraph: India has again denied Pfizer Inc a patent on its rheumatoid arthritis drug tofacitinib, the latest setback for a multinational drugmaker seeking to enforce its intellectual property rights in the country.

headline.main: India Rejects Patent on Pfizer's Arthritis Drug
headline.print_headline: India Rejects Patent on Pfizer's Arthritis Drug

docs.snippet: India has again denied Pfizer Inc a patent on its rheumatoid arthritis drug tofacitinib, the latest setback for a multinational drugmaker seeking to enforce its intellectual property rights in the country.

docs.lead_paragraph: Freelancers deserve more security than the gig economy provides.

headline.main: Help for the Way We Work Now
headline.print_headline: Help for the Way We Work Now

docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Freelancers Union executive director Sara Horowitz charges American political leaders have so far failed to address issue that freelance workers, who now make more than one-third of American economy, do not have access to essential health care and retirement benefits and protections offered by traditional employment; offers suggestions for portable benefits system to fill this gap.
docs.snippet: Freelancers deserve more security than the gig economy provides.

docs.lead_paragraph: A contemplative order in New Jersey, where sisters live in cloister and practice a life of prayer, is attracting eager, college-educated women.

headline.main: Bucking a Trend, Some Millennials Are Seeking a Nun’s Life

docs.abstract: Dominican Monastery of Our Lady of the Rosary in Summit, NJ, is experiencing influx of college-educated millennials over past decade, who are seeking to become nuns; tiny contemplative order, where sisters live in cloisters and practice life of prayer, are struggling to make room for growing monastic community.
docs.snippet: A contemplative order in New Jersey, where sisters live in cloister and practice a life of prayer, is attracting eager, college-educated women.

keywords.value: Center for Applied Research in the Apostolate
keywords.name: organizations

docs.lead_paragraph: The household income for widows declines 37 percent after a spouse dies. Experts say women need to prepare better financially for those years.

headline.main: New Widows Have Another Concern: Their Finances
headline.print_headline: New Widows Have Another Concern: Their Finances

docs.abstract: Retiring column; many widows are vulnerable financially, with typical household income falling 37 percent after spouse dies; women also typically live longer than men, with one in four women aged 65 to 74 a widow.
docs.snippet: The household income for widows declines 37 percent after a spouse dies. Experts say women need to prepare better financially for those years.
